title: Home page hero refresh to promote AI App Builder

requirements.summary: Update the Home page hero headline and styling to strongly promote the AI App Builder with high-contrast emphasis while preserving the existing full-bleed image + readability overlay pattern.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page hero, the primary H1 text is exactly: "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" (including punctuation and capitalization).

The hero styling uses more striking/high-contrast emphasis than the current treatment (e.g., stronger gradient/overlay + vivid accent highlights) while keeping text readable over the existing full-width hero image in both light and dark mode.
The hero remains responsive and visually stable across mobile and desktop, preserving the current full-bleed background image approach and readability overlay behavior.

file_operations.description: Update the hero H1 to exactly "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" and restyle the hero for higher contrast while keeping the existing full-bleed background image (using frontend/public/assets/generated/sidehusl-hero-full.dim_1920x900.jpg) and overlay readability pattern. Increase visual impact via stronger overlay layering (e.g., deeper background fade + vivid primary/accent-tinted wash) and add more prominent headline emphasis (e.g., gradient text/accents) while ensuring readability in both light/dark themes. Continue using the shadcn-ui Button component for CTAs (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Add a small, reusable utility (e.g., a subtle text-shadow / glow utility class) to improve hero text legibility over the full-bleed image in both light and dark modes without changing the global layout/navigation. Ensure the utility is optional and only applied where needed (e.g., Home hero headline/supporting text).

requirements.summary: Adjust the Home page hero supporting copy and CTAs so the primary CTA navigates to /builder and the hero copy promotes the AI App Builder in English without breaking existing navigation paths.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page hero includes a primary CTA button that navigates to /builder.
All updated hero badge/subheadline/CTA labels are in English and align with promoting the AI App Builder (not job discovery).
Existing secondary navigation options (e.g., browse/submit) are not broken; any remaining hero CTAs continue to navigate correctly.

file_operations.description: Rewrite the hero badge/subheadline/supporting copy to promote the AI App Builder (English only). Replace the current primary hero CTA so it routes to /builder (e.g., "Open AI App Builder") while keeping at least one secondary CTA that continues to navigate correctly to an existing destination (e.g., /browse and/or /submit). Ensure the button hierarchy clearly indicates /builder as primary. Continue using the shadcn-ui Button component for CTAs (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
